EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / James Lewis (1342017948.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / James Lewis (1342017948.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jim, Thanks so much for the update. Let me know if you have any questions or if I can provide any help. Take care!Sara From: Jim Lewis [mailto:jimlewis142@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 10, 2012 8:36 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / James Lewis Sara, Unfortunately, details are slow in coming about pending budget cuts. Decisions are still being made about WHAT (who) will be cut, and alternative methods (cheaper) for keeping people who are still desired. The alternative method is the reason I contacted you. As details are sorted out wrt my future, I'll let you know! Jim Lewis From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: jimlewis142@yahoo.com <mailto:jimlewis142@yahoo.com> Sent: Saturday, July 7, 2012 3:05 PM Subject: MBO Partners / James LewisHello James,I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going.We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yNzAmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI3MCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODg1NTcmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4NzU0MDQmZW1haWxpZD1qaW1sZXdpczE0MkB5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTEyODUxLTk0NzYxJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BsrWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yNzAmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI3MCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODg1NTcmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4NzU0MDQmZW1haWxpZD1qaW1sZXdpczE0MkB5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTEyODUxLTk0NzYxJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BsrWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yNzAmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI3MCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODg1NTcmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4NzU0MDQmZW1haWxpZD1qaW1sZXdpczE0MkB5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTEyODUxLTk0NzYxJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BsrWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>
